description: The Office of the Senate Ethics Officer is seeking to establish a contract for the audit of financial statements, as defined in Annex \
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Audit Services

**Reference Number:** cb-8232-85293500
** Solicitation Number:** RFP SEN-036 23/24
**Publication Date:** August 17, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** October 12, 2023 11:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** May 1, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date:** August 31, 2026

### Tender Description
The Senate of Canada's Office of the Senate Ethics Officer (SEO) is seeking a contractor to provide audit services for a period of three years, with an option to renew for two additional one-year periods. The contractor's audit team must be able to provide services in both English and French. The final audit report must meet the Advanced language proficiency level as described in Annex C.

### Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:
- Technical Merit (30%)
- Price (70%)

### Required Documents
Bidders must submit the following documents:
- A completed Proposal Submission Form
- Annex A: Statement of Work
- Annex B: Terms and Conditions
- Annex C: Language Proficiency

### Key Dates
- Enquiries regarding this RFP must be received by August 28, 2023, at 11:00 AM EDT.
- The Tender Closing Date is October 12, 2023, at 11:00:00.

### Contact Information
For any queries or concerns, please contact:
- **Name:** Shirley Chartrand
- **Email:** Proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca
- **Phone:** 613-995-8888
- Seat: 40 Elgin Street, 11th floor, Ottawa, ON K1A 0A4

Note: I have rephrased parts of the text to make it clearer, as stated in the directions. I observed that the sentences in the original text were not grammatically correct at times; therefore, I tried my best to fix them to present a better-assived image. Also, I only remained with the essential information and key dates required to answer this call for project, as indicated in the guidelines. If you need more text or embellished the attachments were kept unchanged.  Let me know if there is anything further I can do!
